patterns: What's the address of ADYPU College ?
responses: Address:- DY Patil Knowledge City Road Via Lohgaon, Airport Rd, Charholi Budruk, Pune, Maharashtra 412105
ADYPU provides sports facilities including facilities to play table tennis, lawn tennis, badminton, swimming, cycling, football and cricket.

patterns: Tell me more about the campus
What type of Facilities are provided here?
responses: To know more about the campus life here please visit- https://adypu.edu.in/campus-life/

patterns: Is there any on campus residence facility ?
responses: Yes hostel facility is avialable here and there are 3 buildings with 4 floors each.

patterns: What are all the programs offered in this university ?
What are all the studying options avialable here ?
What are the courses avialable here ?
responses: There are total 9 types of schools present here which provide diffrent types of courses.For more details please visit- https://adypu.edu.in/programs/

patterns: Which entrace exam is required for admission ?
responses: For admission to this College you need to clear ACET Exam.For more details please visit- https://adypu.edu.in/admissions/how-to-apply/
The aspiring candidate has to appear for ACET (ADYPU Common Entrance Test).For more details please visit- https://adypu.edu.in/admissions/how-to-apply/

patterns: Which companies visit for campus placement ?
responses: ADYPU Placement Cell aims at building a strong interface between industry and the University for Training and placement of students.Top companies such as Maruti Suzuki, Kohler, Byju's, Tata Motors, etc visit for campus placements.For more information please visit- https://adypu.edu.in/placements/

patterns: Where can i contact for queries ?
responses: Email Address- acet@adypu.edu.in , Phone Number- +91-8686868686,020-27409842 , Website- www.adypu.edu.in

patterns: Where do students tend to hang out on and off campus?
Are there movie theaters and concert venues? What about good cafes for getting work done
Are there any nice places to visit nearby ?
Is it easy to get off campus without a car?
responses: There are many places nearby for eating, hanging out such as Cafe Lovebite, Cafe Durga, London Shakes etc, and also shopping malls , grocery stores are also present nearby.

patterns: What type of sports are favoured
responses: Mostly all types of sports are avialable for the student to play such as Cricket, Volleyball, Basketball, Football

The campus is fully equipped with security cameras on each and every corner of the University including the hostel. Also, there are guards on the entries and exits of the College and all the hostlers have to report at 10 PM for attendance

patterns: What is the unique factor in this College
What leads most students to choose this college?
responses: ADYPU is knoown as the Innovation University and thats what unique about this University, we encourage our students to be innovative and provide them with tasks to help them to think innovatively

patterns: Which type of food is avialable ?
responses: There are 4 canteens in the University, which are avialableto everyone and they include food types such as North Indian, South Indian, Chinese,etc (Non Vegetarian options are als avialable)
